Pascal's Triangle II ( mins)

Question：

Description:
  • Given a non-negative index k where k ≤ 33, return the kth index row of the Pascal's triangle.
  • Note that the row index starts from 0.
Note:
  • placeholder
Examples:
Input: 3
Output: [1,3,3,1]

Process:

  • 不知道怎么去更好的优化它
  • 写的时候走点心，用点脑子，别想着老是debug，要人脑debug
